fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
The most important part of this playstyle is to make up for the low scalings on her charged shot by building up high CRIT DMG and consistently landing headshots (weak-point hits) for guaranteed CRIT hit. 

*If playing against enemies with no weak-points or World Bosses, CRIT Rate weapons can be better for balancing your CRIT ratio.*

Elemental Mastery sands is conditionally better, but she must be in a Melt or Vaporize team.
